Hello! i'm Moritz Kröger, a German front-end developer who lives in Berlin. Although Germans typically have a thing for extra long compound words, I am a friend of short functions.

If you want to get in touch with me, just drop me a line or send me a tweet! You can also find my profile on GitHub , StackOverflow , LinkedIn or XING .
